name: The Zone (Proof of concept)
description:
Made in a 36-hour span for Ludum Dare 48. At least I made something!

A proof of concept about using defense to increase your mobility.

Made in the last 36 hours.

Music by @nelon.juice on itch.io! Thanks to him for the jam (what can I say, puns are powerful at 4 AM).

Frankly, I'm a bit ashamed to be uploading this, but as "just freaking make something" practice and considering the time constraints, I'm cool with it.

Movement with WASD and Jump, parry with P.

Again, this was super rushed, so it's nothing more than a few levels and sort of janky controls. Still might be fun to speedrun, though.
